name: ARGENTINA & BRAZIL - GARGANTA DEL DIABLO 0008
description: The Iguazu Falls captivate visitors with their thundering cascade and lush surrounding rainforest. Get ready to be enchanted by the sheer magnitude and raw beauty of this natural wonder. The border runs right through the middle of the Devil's Throat (Garganta del Diablo) with 20% falling on the BRAZILian side and an impressive 80% in the Argentinian side.
